description:
Elise has proven repeatedly that she is one of the most masochistic models, ever. In the past I have pushed and pushed, so today will not be an exception. I set out to make this more brutal than anything I have done to her so far. This time the bondage will be what pushes this slut to the edge of breaking.

The first position, she is not bound to anything and I manhandle this slut. Once I have made her my bitch, I pull her into one of two, of the most extreme suspensions she will have to face today. All of her weight hangs from a single point around her waist, which constricts her diaphragm, and makes breathing a bitch.

She is then put in a standing strappado, and tormented harder than ever before, and a crotch rope is added to intensify her suffering. At the end she is pulled into the air, only hanging from her wrists.

The final scene has her on her back, with her legs spread wide. She is in a precarious postion, fully exposed, and aware that this shoot will end with a bang.
title: This Bitch Will Suffer in My Ropes!!!
